Outstanding puzzle shooter. The game never ceases to throw you into the next stage through clever level design, demanding more and more out of the player's problem-solving, shooting, and movement skills. Additionally, the story is excellent, rewarding patient and observant players with a fleshed-out thriller that ties together all the setting elements. Definitely worth playing if you are interested in puzzles and can at least tolerate first-person shooters.

Спасибо Габену за эту чудесную игр,  жду и надеюсь на 3 часть, надеюсь что она выйдет до того как я откинусь)))

I know this is an old game, but there are so many issues. I gave this game a chance, thinking the game would get better as it went on, but decided to end my playthrough when I got basically softlocked. I'm stuck on 1 hp with the only way to recover it or progress being to fight a bunch of enemies which are almost impossible to get past without being hit. There's not enough first aid stations to go around, causing this softlock, and even less hev stations. Perhaps there could be natural health regeneration when you're on less than 20 hp or so?
My second issue is that it's not very straight-forward. Half the time I have no idea where to go, so I have to look at a walkthrough often. The other half of that time is spent wondering if I'm even going the right way. If a room's supposed to be a bonus room, then it should be clear that it's not part of the main game. (Who's supposed to know that, instead of finding a way to open a door that seemingly guarantees to lead somewhere, you're supposed to go through a random vent in a random room?)
My final issue is smaller, but saves are... weird. Your game saves every time you enter a new loading zone, which seems good, but that means if you need to backtrack (for instance after turning on the power for the cart), you have to go all the way back to the most recently discovered area instead of the most recently visited area when you die. I wasted probably around half an hour on just trying to get back to the cart from the power station. (And yes, I know manual saves are a thing, but they didn't seem to work for me)

There are positive things about half life, but these issues are what's preventing me from enjoying it.

I just completed Half-Life 1 for the first time. It was very fulfilling to do so. I usually get stuck sort of early on in the game, but this time I powered through and am very happy I did so. I recommend this game. 

The start is incredibly powerful and an absolutely iconic scene of Gaming. The following levels are equally strong, although as I am sure we all know, On A Rail can prove to be a very contentious level. I didn't mind it too much, but honestly just abandon the little traincart, making your way on foot is more effective. Otherwise, the levels after that were quite great. This game is difficult though, which I think is a good thing, but one should go into the game with the idea that at some points it can be as hard as Dark Souls. 

Xen is another iffy chapter of the game. Really slogged through it using the Hivehand because I hand no proper ammo. Quicksave is your friend. I prefer HL1 Xen over Black Mesa Xen, beause it lasts only an hour which I find a lot more tolerable than Black Mesa's Xen. The Nihilanth fight in HL1 kinda sucked because there isn't a clear aim, but die enough and you'll figure it out. Again, I quicksaved a bunch in this game and I'm not ashamed of doing so. 

To conclude, I think anyone and everyone should play this game, and I think it is a good game. However, I'm not delusional and it's clear that in some aspects the game has grown quite clunky. Got into playing it properly commited and willing to put in the effort, and you'll be rewarded with the wisdom Half-Life can give you.

[h1]Half Life 1 [/h1]
[b]Genel inceleme[/b]
FPS Shooter bir oyun dönemine göre iyi bir hikaye anlatım şekline sahip olsa da bu gün oynanabilecek bir oyun değil grafikleri ve oynanışı geri kalmış bölümlerin bazıları sinir bozucu ve birkaç oyunu mahveden büyük hata var
[b]Grafikler[/b]
Grafikler eski bir oyun olduğu için kötü bir süre sonra göze iyice batmaya ve sıkmaya başlıyor
[b]Oynanış[/b]
Oynanış olarak oyun düz bir ilerleyişe sahip save sistemi eski bir oyun olduğu için çok sıkıntı devamlı quick save yapmanız gerekiyor bazı yerler gereksiz bir zorlukla yapılmış dönemine göre normal olsa da şu an için normal değil.Oyunun en büyük sorunu ise hatalar birkaç adet hata olmasına rağmen saveinizi işe yaramaz kılıyor.
[b]Müzikler[/b]
Müzikler çok iyi seçilmiş yerleri Haritalara göre çok uyumlu olmuş bu gün bile bu tür müziklere sahip olamayan bir sürü FPS oyunu var
[b]Bölüm Dizaynları[/b]
Bölüm dizaynları ara sıra sıksa da genel olarak güzel yapılmış gerçekten bir bilim tesisinde olduğunuzu hissetdiriyor
[b]Mekanikler[/b]
Birkaç silah dışında mekanikler çok kötü vuruş hissiyatı yok sanki duvara sıkıyormuşsunuz gibi hissetdiriyor tek iyi özelliği silah çeşitliliği iyi
[b]Hikaye[/b]
Hikayesi boş bir hikaye bu gün için klişe kalan bir hikaye.Anakarakterin sessiz olup hiç tepki vermemesi ve gelişim göstermemesi bir bilim adamının nasıl bir anda bir orduya bedel birine dönüştüğü sorusunu sordurtuyor
[b]Online[/b]
Online ı güzeldi gayet zevkli hızlı ve akıcı bir oynanışa sahip kafa dağıtmalık birkaç saat oynanabilecek bir online a sahip
[b]Fiyat/Performans[/b]
Fiyat performans ürünüdür alıp oynamanızı tavsiye ederim eğer oyun size eski geliyorsa remakeini almalısınız ama nolursa olsun onlineı denemelisiniz
[b]Değerlendirmen Yorum[/b]
Ben Doom/Wolfestein ile büyümüş biri ve FPS oyunlarına aşık biri olarak biraz vasat kalmış
[b]Puanlandırma[/b]

Genel Puan:65/100
Grafikler :50/100
Oynanış :50/100
Müzikler :85/100
Bölümler :70/100
Mekanikler:60/100
Hikaye :50/100
Ek Puan :50/100
